title: ROUND THE BEND - Nevil Shute. Read Christopher Hurt {FerraBit}
description:
ROUND THE BEND, by Nevil Shute (1951)

Narrated by Christopher Hurt
Unabridged, 9 audio cassettes 
Books On Tape Inc., 1985. 

Shute believed Round The Bend to be his finest novel.
A superb performance by Christopher Hurt as reader.

I could not find this recording in digital format,
so I converted my copy of this recording to MP3.
From audio cassette (Nakamichi Dragon) to CD 
(Pioneer PDR-555RW) to MP3 (iTunes 8, 96kbps VBR).

Dolby NR was NOT used - you can post-process or
equalize to your liking.

Cheers, FerraBit
January 2009
